title: Vega C to launch five Copernicus spacecraft
summary: The European Commission awarded a contract to Arianespace Nov. 29 for launches of five Copernicus Earth observation spacecraft on Vega C rockets between 2024 and 2026.

title: China’s Tianzhou-4 cargo spacecraft deployed a small satellite before deorbiting
summary: China’s Tianzhou-4 cargo spacecraft released a small satellite after its departure from the Tiangong space station and ahead of its controlled deorbiting.

title: Shenzhou 15 astronauts arrive at China’s space station for first crew handover
summary: China has six astronauts aboard its recently-completed space station for the first time following the arrival of three crew members aboard Shenzhou-15.

title: NASA cancels GeoCarb greenhouse gas monitoring mission
summary: NASA has canceled a greenhouse gas monitoring mission once intended to fly as a commercial hosted payload after the mission lost its ride to orbit and suffered severe cost overruns.

title: Shay Har-Noy takes the helm at Edgybees
summary: Shay Har-Noy, former Spire Global general manager for aviation and a former DigitalGlobe and Maxar Technologies vice president, has taken the helm at Edgybees, a company that specializes in aligning satellite and aerial still and full-motion imagery.
